sentences.sentence: This picture was taken at Villa Park just minutes after the Geordies' relegation from the Premier League had been confirmed.
sentences.translation: 该图摄于维拉公园，此前数分钟高地人刚刚确定从英超降级。

sentences.sentence: An Italian temptress arrives at a school in Newcastle, in Northern England, to teach a group of Geordies about the art of romance.
sentences.translation: 一名意大利人来到了英国北部纽卡斯尔的一所学校，教一群乔德人（纽卡斯尔当地人）关于浪漫的艺术。
